subject: p16508811
History: With ESRD T1DM and HTN now s/p DDRT most recently in , COPD, DM, PVD, atrial fibrillation on coumadin, congestive heart failure LVEF = , C diff, and recent NSTEMI on who presents with one week of URI symptoms and increasing shortness of breath with CXR concerning for PNA. , Eval for volume overload, change in PNA Eval for volume overload, change in PNA.
Impression: In comparison with the study of, there is diffuse increase in opacifications bilaterally. Although some of this could represent volume overload, much of the opacification, especially on the left, is consistent with superimposed pneumonia.
